dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's passport, that turquoise one, has really become this huge symbol of unity, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's passport, that turquoise one, has really become this huge symbol of unity, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Speaking at the 34th session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan, Tokayev stated that the country's turquoise passport has become a symbol of unity and shared identity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, President Tokayev was just talking about that at the 34th session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan. He said it's a reflection of national identity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, President Tokayev was just talking about that at the thirty fourth session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan. He said it's a reflection of national identity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has highlighted the growing strength and symbolism of Kazakhstan's passport, describing it as a reflection of national identity and the country's global reputation. Speaking at the 34th session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan, Tokayev stated that the country's turquoise passport has become a symbol of unity and shared identity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he mentioned it's actually growing in strength year by year. Like, more people are accepting it, and it's becoming a bigger deal globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he mentioned it's actually growing in strength year by year. Like, more people are accepting it, and it's becoming a bigger deal globally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The strength of our passport is growing year by year, which speaks to Kazakhstan's increasing appeal and influence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes sense because he also brought up how Kazakhstan is outperforming its neighbors in safety rankings—43rd out of 142 countries in order and security.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes sense because he also brought up how Kazakhstan is outperforming its neighbors in safety rankings-forty third out of one hundred forty two countries in order and security.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the President, Kazakhstan outperforms many of its neighbors in global safety rankings. He also noted that the country ranks 43rd out of 142 nations in the Order and Security category of the Rule of Law Index.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's pretty impressive, honestly. And it's not just about safety; he said more people are choosing to live there or visit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's pretty impressive, honestly. And it's not just about safety; he said more people are choosing to live there or visit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More and more people from across the globe are choosing Kazakhstan as a destination for living and tourism.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the APK itself is a big part of that unity message. This year is its 30th anniversary, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the A P K itself is a big part of that unity message. This year is its thirtieth anniversary, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year marks the 30th anniversary of the APK.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—30 years bringing together all these ethnic groups. It's a consultative body, but it does so much more than that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactlyminus thirty years bringing together all these ethnic groups. It's a consultative body, but it does so much more than that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan is a consultative and advisory body that unites representatives of all ethnic groups living in the republic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Like fostering mutual respect and civic responsibility, which is huge for a country with so much diversity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like fostering mutual respect and civic responsibility, which is huge for a country with so much diversity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to him, the assembly's role goes beyond preserving cultural heritage " it fosters an atmosphere of mutual respect, civic responsibility, and unity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Tokayev chairs it himself, so there's real top-level support for what they're doing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Tokayev chairs it himself, so there's real top-level support for what they're doing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Kazakhstan serves as the Chair of the APK.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I remember the last session had that theme—Unity. Creation. Progress. It was in Astana back in April.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I remember the last session had that theme-Unity. Creation. Progress. It was in Astana back in April.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 33rd session, titled Unity. Creation. Progress, was held in Astana on April 24"25, 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and now they're using this session to rethink their mission after three decades. It's a big moment for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and now they're using this session to rethink their mission after three decades. It's a big moment for them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year's session, he added, will be a starting point for rethinking the APK's mission, summarizing over 30 years of its work and outlining new directions for development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely feels like they're positioning Kazakhstan as not just stable, but also open and unified, which is a powerful message.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely feels like they're positioning Kazakhstan as not just stable, but also open and unified, which is a powerful message.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the passport thing—it's such a tangible symbol of that progress, you know? Like, it represents all of that on a global stage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the passport thing-it's such a tangible symbol of that progress, you know? Like, it represents all of that on a global stage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's not just a travel document anymore; it's part of the brand.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's not just a travel document anymore; it's part of the brand.
